projects.title: HOMEPAGE
projects.description: Website of a fictitious company, it shows their website creation services, their projects they have worked on and who they are.

projects.title: BLOG
projects.description: A fake blog with content on many topics.

projects.title: SPOTIFY CLONE
projects.description: It copies desktop and mobile user interface, it does not have the functionalities to play music.

projects.title: RULE OF RUFFINI
projects.description: It can factor third degree polynomials equal to zero.

projects.title: RESTAURANT ORDERS
projects.description: The user can order the products of the restaurant and pay for them.

projects.title: ECOMMERCE
projects.description: It has a shopping cart and its data is obtained from an API. Users can register with email, they will be assigned a random amount of fake money so they can pay for the products added to the cart.

projects.title: SIGNAL CLONE
projects.description: It copies mobile user interface and it has the functionalities to chat globally, switch between dark and light themes, and switch between spanish and english languages.
